    • Flower

      public Flower(Garden garden, int row, int column, String name)
      Create a new flower (row,column) in the garden garden. Every new flower is going to be alive in the following state.
      Parameters:
      garden - The garden
      row - The row
      column - The column

    • calculateDistance

      protected static int calculateDistance(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Calculate the position between two points.
      Parameters:
      x1 - The x-coordinate of the first point.
      y1 - The y-coordinate of the first point.
      x2 - The x-coordinate of the second point.
      y2 - The y-coordinate of the second point.
      Returns:
      The calculated distance.

      Parameters:
      newRow - The row to check
      newColumn - The Column to check
      Returns:
      true if the position is valid, otherwise false
